meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Noh chanting</kanji> for <kanji>juvenile</kanji>s are <vocabulary>nursery rhyme</vocabulary>s. Kids won't understand the heavy stuff, so you have to dumb it down for them.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
